getLeavingTransitions

public Transition[] getLeavingTransitions(java.lang.String state)
                                   throws WorkflowException
Description copied from interface: Workflow
Returns the transitions that leave a state. This method is used, e.g., to disable menu items.

Specified by:
getLeavingTransitions in interface Workflow
Parameters:
state - A state.
Returns:
The transitions that leave the state.
Throws:
WorkflowException - if the state is not contained.
See Also:
Workflow.getLeavingTransitions(java.lang.String)
